{{unreferenced|date=December 2010}} {{Infobox Company | company_name = Frontier Communications of the Carolinas, Inc.| company_logo = | company_type = [[Private company|Private]] (Subsidiary of [[Frontier Communications|Frontier]])| company_slogan = | foundation = 2009| location = [[USA]]| key_people = | industry = [[Telecommunications]]| num_employees = | products = [[Telephone|Local Telephone Service]]| parent = [[Verizon]] (2009-2010)
[[Frontier Communications|Frontier]] (2010-present)| revenue = | homepage = [http://www.frontier.com www.frontier.com]| }} '''Frontier Communications of the Carolinas, Inc.''' is an operating company created in [[2009]][http://www.secretary.state.nc.us/corporations/Corp.aspx?PitemId=9216379 North Carolina Secretary of State] when some assets of [[Verizon South]] were split off and sold to [[Frontier Communications]]. The company provides local telephone service to former [[Verizon]] (formerly [[GTE]] and [[Contel]]) customers in portions of southern [[Wisconsin]], [[Illinois]], [[South Carolina]], and [[North Carolina]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Frontier}} [[Category:Frontier Communications]] [[Category:Verizon Communications]] [[Category:Companies established in 2009]]
